title: Currency Converter
howToUseTitle: Guide to using the currency converter
conversionNote1: • The calculation is for informational purposes only and does not replace Brazilian foreign exchange regulations for specific conversion cases.
conversionNote2: • Conversions are available for dates from 02/01/1999.
conversionNote3: • For non-business days, the exchange rate of the previous business day is used.
howToUse: How to use the Currency Converter?
step1: 1- Enter the value of the currency to be converted;
step2: 2- Select the currency to convert in the 'From:' field;
step3: 3- Select the currency to convert to in the 'To:' field;
step4: 4- The values will be automatically calculated.
